CustomField.description: External Task ID for integration with non-Salesforce task management systems or applications. Integrations should use this field for the external system ID to maintain integrity and allow upserts.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: External Task ID for integration with non-Salesforce task management systems or applications. Integrations should use this field for the external system ID to maintain integrity and allow upserts.
CustomField.label: External Task ID
